room_title: Escape room "Mr Oswald’s Greatest Show" by Novus Escape Room in Kansas City
room_description:
A marionette is a tool which allows a puppeteer to create a nonverbal performance. The name Marionette originated from a French word meaning “a type of puppet moved by the use of strings”.
Mr. Oswald is a famous marionette performed by a mysterious puppeteer who keeps his identity hidden, piquing curiosites worldwide. Tonight in Mr. Oswald’s Greatest Show, the puppeteer has promised to reveal his identity to a few lucky spectators! Now is your chance to get to know the man of mystery behind Mr Oswald!
